sentences.english: How long will that special date? Llama Llama has to wait.
sentences.chinese: 多久纔到這個特別的日子？羊駝拉瑪要等待。

sentences.english: Screening, evaluation and in vitro cultivation of epidermal stem cells;
sentences.chinese: 建立羊駝毛囊幹細胞的分離和培養方法。

sentences.english: A baby Guanaco is attended to by her mother Hannah (R) in their enclosure at the zoo in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 在柏林動物園裏，羊駝幼仔正受到母羊駝漢娜的愛撫。

sentences.english: Fleece production is the main performance of alpaca . The fleece is called as soft gold.
sentences.chinese: 羊駝主要用於生產絨毛，其絨毛被譽爲“軟黃金”。

sentences.english: Pianezzi has slowly introduced his alpaca, a domesticated animal from the Andean highlands, to the water over the past several months.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾個月裏，多明戈一點一點地教羊駝下水。

sentences.english: 'Alpaca has been very well embraced from the Australian public, ' he said in the video.
sentences.chinese: “澳洲民衆都很喜歡羊駝肉，”他在視頻中說。
羊駝的填充玩具在增多。

sentences.english: Thirdly , the analysis of G-bands showed that bright and dark bands appeared by turn. It showed different bands.
sentences.chinese: 帶分析表明，羊駝G帶明暗相間，顯現出不同的帶紋。

sentences.english: Gold and silver veined the mountains, and herds of alpacas and llamas fattened in lush meadows.
sentences.chinese: 茂盛的草地養肥了大批羊駝和美洲駝。

definition: to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
